141.content: Daisy Johnson aka Quake, an Inhuman who works with Shield, gets hit with a weight gain gun, made from Chitauri tech, while she was fighting some Hydra men. She becomes unconscious and her fellow Shield agents come in and take her to a Quinjet, when she wakes up she is horrified when she sees her changed body. The weight gain gun had made Daisy gain weight mostly in her bottom section. Her belly has become knead-able, her breast have become the size of half of a basketball, and her leg and thigh, and butt were affected the most with being all swollen and large with fat. She also finds that her fellow Shield comrade and friend Simmons got some of Daisy's infected blood in a giant syringe. Simmons tells her that even with some of her blood out of her system, if she uses the big syringe with her own blood she would gain more weight. Daisy is mad at her for even having her blood being tested, so pushes Simmons and gets up and goes to where the syringe is, but due to her big fat legs, she trips and is about to fall on the syringe.
141.title: Marvel

choices: Daisy will once again get hit the gun
Simmons will get hit by the gun
Yo-Yo will get hit while running
1411.content: When Daisy falls down she gets accidentally gets injected with her own blood, but this makes her gain weight. Because of this, her suit starts to rip mainly in her behind, the Quinjet then lands in the Playground, the primary Shield base. When they land in the base, Daisy tries to quickly run out of there before anyone gets to her, but falls on the floor, she does get up and run into one of the dorm rooms. She takes off her gauntlets, that control her Quake powers, and her suit, when she looks at a mirror she's horrified how much she has gain and see her almost obese body, showing that her face has some chubby cheeks. Simmons opens the dorm door and tells Daisy that they also have the gun that made Daisy become fat and it's with Simmons' boyfriend Leo Fitz and fellow Inhuman Shield agent, Yo-Yo Rodriguez. Daisy follows Simmons to the Playground's lab and meet up with Fitz and Yo-Yo, they are shook with Daisy new fat body with Daisy being fatigue about comments on her body, Simmons and Fitz show them the gun, but when they do something on the gun, it activates and a laser comes out, continually firing around the lab. Daisy falls on her bottom, but realizes she is sitting Fitz, Simmons is mad at this accident and start to argue. Yo-Yo tries to run to the gun, but when she does she makes the gun turn and make a flip, firing at someone.
